## sip.js package

A SessionDescriptionHandler for web browsers.

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [SessionDescriptionHandler](./sip.js.sessiondescriptionhandler.md) | A base class implementing a WebRTC session description handler for sip.js. |
